name: C H E R R Y D R E A M [walking 'round a surreal dream field]
name_original: C H E R R Y D R E A M [walking 'round a surreal dream field]
description:
NOTE: We recommend the Download windows version.  
Download version: Has music in the field.   Every character (& mirror) says something  different.
Web version:  Has no sound whatsoever.  Every character (& mirror) says "HEYO" and that is it.  Not filler... just a different dream.  One where everyone says "HEYO" ... 

C H E R R Y D R E A M  [walking 'round a surreal dream field] is a little environment to explore.  You play as tomato-headed dreamer, Cherry, as they find themselves in a strange field of bright n curious creatures, lily pads, and meloncholic piano lines.  

--Controls--

[ WASD ] - move around 

[ space ] - talk to people (and one mirror)

[left mouse click] - continue conversation

There is not exit button, so you have to end the program manually.

--Bug Notes--

- Besides some visual errors in the tilesets (web and download) and the missing music (web only), there is only one bug: and his name is Bug! Go say hi to him-  he will tell ya.

--Bug Facts--

- 1 out of every 4 animals on Earth is a beetle! 

--Credits--

All characters, story content, art, and music assets are original and are (c) FishChiesa, Danguino, and ManlyManton.  Fish handled the art, Danguino handled the music, Manly handled the coding backbone. 

--Tools--

Game Engine: Unity
Art programs:
Medibang (digital art),
Graphics Gale (pixels),
Traditional ink/scanned (all character lineart)
Music program:  MuseScore, Audacity

--Misc.--

Yup. An actual game was planned and designed.  ManlyManton even worked out an inventory system! But we ran short on time.  Enjoy the rather static environmental storytelling to showcase our art, lore, and music.

This game jam game is brought to you from the lil game dev studio Box of Mushrooms.        Box of Mushrooms on twitter: https://twitter.com/BoxOfMushrooms
 Box of Mushrooms Discord: https://discord.gg/k9ythJc4

You can follow our narrative game in early development "Gazelle in a Winter Coat"  Gazelle in a Winter Coat official website:  https://gazelleinawintercoat.com/

WISHLIST GAZELLE IN A WINTER COAT ON STEAM: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1702480/Gazelle_in_a_Winter_Coat/
